# Gingerbread
Gingerbreads are a species of sentient confectionary. They have sugar for blood, and can be butchered for cookies. Being made of dough, they weight half as much as species made of flesh.
## Damage stats
Gingerbreads take 3x less fire damage than Humans, do not take Asphyxiation (though they still breathe and are uncorfortable without oxygen), Bloodloss (though again, are uncorfortable without sugar) and Cold damage (though are slowed down by cold), but take 1.5x more Blunt damage and take a lot of Heat damage from being exposed to water externally.
